vegetative gametophyte and changes in the expression of auxin related

is expressed throughout the life cycle, with a relatively higher
expression in archegoniophore and antheridiophore (Bowman et al. 2017; Schmid et al. 2018).
for in the transition between the
vegetative and reproductive stages..It was reported that DNA methylation patterns are
dramatically different between sporophytes, vegetative gametophyte, and gametangia in
, suggesting the existence of epigenetic reprogramming at least twice in the life
may have functions in many specific stages of the life
cycle. In this report, we used Mp
mutants and focused on the function in gametophyte, but
conditional knock out and reporter analysis may elucidate more precise function of Mp
Non-CG methylation is strongly facilitated in Mp
Our methylome analysis revealed that Mp
mutants display a unique DNA methylation pattern
in that non-CG methylation levels are drastically increased at TEs. Such increase in non-CG
methylation has not been observed in
, while PCGs tend to gain CHG methylation in their body in first-generation
